Package data

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
data.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
Central data management class responsible for all data storage, retrieval, and persistence. Manages collections of users, internships, applications, and activity logs. Provides methods to load data from files and retrieve data by ID or other criteria.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DataManager()
    Constructs a new DataManager, initializing all data storage maps and lists.

  • Method Details

    • loadStudents

      public void loadStudents(String filePath)
      Loads student data from the specified file path. Each line should contain pipe-separated student information.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the students data file

    • loadStaff

      public void loadStaff(String filePath)
      Loads career center staff data from the specified file path. Each line should contain pipe-separated staff information.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the staff data file

    • loadCompanyReps

      public void loadCompanyReps(String filePath)
      Loads company representative data from the specified file path. Each line should contain pipe-separated company representative information.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the company representatives data file

    • loadInternships

      public void loadInternships(String filePath)
      Loads internship data from the specified file path. Each line should contain pipe-separated internship information.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the internships data file

    • linkInternshipsToReps

      public void linkInternshipsToReps()
      Links internships to their respective company representatives. This method establishes the relationship between internships and their managing representatives.

    • loadApplications

      public void loadApplications(String filePath)
      Loads internship application data from the specified file path. Each line should contain pipe-separated application information.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the applications data file

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user)
      Adds a user to the data storage. The user is stored in the appropriate specific map based on their type.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String userID)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the user object, or null if not found

    • saveAllData

      public void saveAllData(String studentsPath, String staffPath, String companyRepsPath, String internshipsPath, String applicationsPath)
      Saves all data to their respective file paths. This is a convenience method that saves students, staff, company representatives, internships, and applications.
      Parameters:
      studentsPath - the path where student data should be saved
      staffPath - the path where staff data should be saved
      companyRepsPath - the path where company representative data should be saved
      internshipsPath - the path where internship data should be saved
      applicationsPath - the path where application data should be saved
